thread.title: Senator Joe Manchin Will Give Judge Gorsuch a Fair Shake (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Senator Joe Manchin Will Give Judge Gorsuch a Fair Shake (VIDEO)

author: TMZ Staff
title: Senator Joe Manchin Will Give Judge Gorsuch a Fair Shake (VIDEO)
text:
Senator Joe Manchin Will Give Judge Gorsuch a Fair Shake (VIDEO) Senator Joe Manchin I'll Give Judge Gorsuch a Fair Shake 2/1/2017 3:56 PM PST EXCLUSIVE 
Senator Joe Manchin is a Democrat who is definitely not down with torpedoing Judge Neil Gorsuch ï»¿as the nom for SCOTUS. 
We got the Senator at the Capital doing a quick meet and greet with Trump 's pick. 
The Dems are threatening to do unto Trump what the Republicans did to Obama 's failed pick for Supreme Court ... not even give him a hearing. 
Senator Manchin isn't an eye-for-an-eye kinda guy.
